content: As of Oct. 2, you can score a Fire TV Stick and Luna controller for just $69.98, down from $129.98 at Amazon. That's a $60 discount.
summary: As of Oct. 2, you can score a Fire TV Stick and Luna controller for just $69.98, down from $129.98 at Amazon. That's a $60 discount.
